review_title: Good to work with them. HR dept made life difficult.
job_title: Clinical Research Fellow in Cape Town
pros: Good pay. It is easy to book annual leave using the online system. My boss/supervisor was supportive.
cons: The HR dept. was quite incompetent. It took a long time to get my contract sorted and they continued to hassle me for paperwork long after I had started my work. When leaving, I tried to claim back pay for un-unsed days of annual leave and HR tried to fob me off. Thankfully I pointed to the clause in my contract, persisted and they paid it out.
